title: ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found
body_html:
Python Import Error with a message " ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found. "

I am installed pytorch using
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.0-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
on plan python (not conda), and running hello world program and getting the same error.

Code

from __future__ import print_function
import torch

(as given at https://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/blitz/tensor_tutorial.html#sphx-glr-beginner-blitz-tensor-tutorial-py)

Error


Traceback (most recent call last):
 File "C:\Users\Prashant\Desktop\test.py", line 9, in <module>
   import torch
 File "C:\Python\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 78, in <module>
   from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

System Info

OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
GCC version: (tdm64-1) 5.1.0
CMake version: version 3.12.0-rc2

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No, I am using AMD
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip3] numpy (1.14.5)
[pip3] numpydoc (0.8.0)
[pip3] torch (0.4.0)
[pip3] torchvision (0.2.1)
[conda] Could not collect

I already tried below answers

#4518
peterjc123/pytorch-scripts#26
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/windows-10-cant-import-torch/18100 (installed both)

rename the _C not working in my case

*Most of the answer is for conda ,linux and NVIDA so some of them are not relevant

Screenshot of torch folder

body:
## Python Import Error with a message " ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found. "

I am installed pytorch using
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.4.0-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl 
on plan python (not conda), and running hello world program and getting the same error.

## Code 
```
from __future__ import print_function
import torch
```
(as given at https://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/blitz/tensor_tutorial.html#sphx-glr-beginner-blitz-tensor-tutorial-py)

## Error
 ```

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\Prashant\Desktop\test.py", line 9, in <module>
    import torch
  File "C:\Python\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 78, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.
```

## System Info

> OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
> GCC version: (tdm64-1) 5.1.0
> CMake version: version 3.12.0-rc2
> 
> Python version: 3.6
> Is CUDA available: No, I am using AMD
> CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
> GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
> Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
> cuDNN version: No CUDA
> 
> Versions of relevant libraries:
> [pip3] numpy (1.14.5)
> [pip3] numpydoc (0.8.0)
> [pip3] torch (0.4.0)
> [pip3] torchvision (0.2.1)
> [conda] Could not collect


## I already tried below answers 

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/4518
https://github.com/peterjc123/pytorch-scripts/issues/26
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/windows-10-cant-import-torch/18100 (installed both)

rename the _C not working in my case

*Most of the answer is for conda ,linux and NVIDA so some of them are not relevant 

Screenshot of torch folder
![2018-07-01](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12370519/42128896-631327dc-7cd3-11e8-88de-065ea01225fb.png)
